data.title: Thunderbird Beach Resort
data.meta_description: "Where St. Petersburg's Central Avenue Meets the Gulf of Mexico"Our Classic Courtyard Style Beach Resort has been a family favorite for generations. Nestled on the beautiful shoreline of the Gulf of Mexico, the Thunderbird Beach Resort is a tropical beach retreat with long stretches of pearly-white sand & sparkling blue waters.The Thunderbird Beach Resort is directly in the heart of Treasure Island within walking distance of many fine restaurants, beach shops, grocery stores, and plenty of day or night time activities.
data.text: "Where St. Petersburg's Central Avenue Meets the Gulf of Mexico"Our Classic Courtyard Style Beach Resort has been a family favorite for generations. Nestled on the beautiful shoreline of the Gulf of Mexico, the Thunderbird Beach Resort is a tropical beach retreat with long stretches of pearly-white sand & sparkling blue waters.The Thunderbird Beach Resort is directly in the heart of Treasure Island within walking distance of many fine restaurants, beach shops, grocery stores, and plenty of day or night time activities. Being located within 10 minutes of Downtown St Petersburg gives you access to all sorts of art galleries, festivals, museums, and concerts. Anything is possible on your dream vacation!Featuring...Oversized Heated Pool & Hot Tub Ikky Woo Woo's Tiki Beach Bar w/ Live Music Soleil Bistro featuring Chef Karim Sunset Meeting & Banquet Facilities Private Gulf Front Balconies Suites Free High-Speed Wireless Internet Lobby Computer Workstation Beach & Pool Towels Kids Stay Free! All Non-Smoking Guest Rooms This "Classic-Florida" resort is the perfect place to do it all or nothing at all and has always been a family favorite.
